channel.title: LOCKED: Upgrade Planning
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "LOCKED: Upgrade Planning" - So...what upgrade should we go for first?

item.title: Re: Upgrade Planning
item.content:encoded: Party house has been purchased, locking this thread.

item.title: Upgrade Planning
item.content:encoded:
My initial inclination is to go for the Party House, because that has some use. Then, go for the Hitaiate Maker just to give our Village some actual personality.

After that, I think the moment we have 10 people and the resources to do it, we should enter the Ninja World War. There's no reason to stop our Chunin from becoming special jonin for any longer than is absolutely necessary.
